DOC.brief_title: Psychotherapy Outcome Self-selection Effects Panic Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: After thorough assessment person panic disorder diagnosis randomly assign three arm : one randomization , one self-selection , one low-contact wait list one . In randomization arm ( R ) 95 person randomly assign Panic Control Treatment ( PCT ) Panic-Focused Psychodynamic Psychotherapy ( PFPP ) ; self-selection arm ( SS ) 95 person offer , adequate information , choose two prefer . Twenty-six person initially randomize three-month wait list ( sparse contact telephone ) , re-randomized , either randomization ( PCT PFPP ) self-selection . The four group ( R/PCT ; R/PFPP ; SS/PCT ; SS/PFPP ) compare basis intake repeat outcome/follow-up assessment .
